text: Juda vahe'mota tamagrama tamavesi nezamantaza mofavre nagatamina, ame hu'za hanare'za vugahazanki tamasunku hunezamanteta tamaseni tamazokara vazagategahaze. Na'ankure mofavre nagatamima zamavare'za afete moparegama kinafima vanaza zanku huta tamaseni tamazokara vazagate atresageno fankimofo kokovite azoka'ma omaneaza huno tamanuntera tamazokara omanegahie.
